p: NS seeds are the core natural source containing TQ compounds [ 50]. Besides the Ranunculaceae plant family, considered a main source of NS seeds, other types of the Lamiaceae family such as Coridothymus, Agastache, Monarda, Origanum, Mosla, Satureja, and Thymus were also described as possible sources for TQ extraction [ 50]. Similarly, chemical isolation of TQ has also been reported from Tetraclinis plants, as well as the Cupressaceae family [ 51]. Reduced forms of TQ like dithymoquinone and thymohydroquinone have also been detected in trace amounts in other plant families and may share similar medicinal characteristics with TQ [ 52].
